briefTitle: Study of Neural Responses Induced by Antidepressant Effects
officialTitle: Study of Neural Responses Induced by Simulated Antidepressants

interventions.name: Real-time Neurofeedback fMRI task pre- and post-RCT

summary: The proposed work aims to examine the neural changes associated with fast-acting antidepressant treatments in order to develop imaging-based biomarkers of treatment response for depression.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Montgomery-Åsberg Depression Rating Scale (MADRS) Scores
